message: Light came in quick and they are pretty bright

This pattern is okay if you just want to look at the details (though not 100% accurate). I am not sure if anyone before actually tried to assemble it for cosplay but it's not a good pattern and scaling it for a taller person is rather difficult. Ended up making my own patterns so basically wasted money here.
This pattern worked really well for making the shoulder armor, and I’m excited to work on the rest
Helpful seller. Replies fairly quickly and efficiently
lovely seller, helped me anytime i had a question :)
great work and communication! will come back everytime
The file is complete and with great quality
Excellent model. The best version by far
ottimo file! i pezzi era ben sistemati e non ho dovuto fare modifiche di nessun tipo
Me fue de mucha ayuda hoy en día ya tengo listo los props para un evento aca en Ecuador @budokan
Articolo come da descrizione. Venditore affidabilissimo. Tutto perfetto
Wonderful pattern and the seller is very kind and helpful!
Glad this exists. Really helps making a armor template
Looks great and I can't wait to build it!
Nice worker and refund my commission immediatly
